title: Braindead
review: This should be as famous as The Evil Dead, and I like it much more. It's a comedy with real jokes, as well as comedic gore. It's so successful at what it attempts: it had me laughing, rooting for the protagonists, unsure of what would happen next, and easily earning a perfect grotesque score. The main character is like Frank Spencer, and seeing him fight his overbearing zombified mother as they listened to The Archers was very funny.
